"(Fun_Math)^2 

"
"(Fun_Math)^2 is a simple math game where user need to guess the correct length perfect square given the prefix. There are basically three rounds.

" "First Round:
" "User need to guess 5 different perfect squares of length 3 given a prefix of length 2." "If user is able to guess the correct square then" "he wins and press next to continue

" "Second Round:
" "Here the user need to guess 5 different perfect squares of length 4 given a prefix of length 2.

" "Third Round:
" "Here the user need to guess 5 different perfect squares of length 5 given a prefix of length 2.

" "Entering "SOLVE" at any stage leads to display of the appropriate perfect Square.

" "Next he enter FINISH to end the game.


"
